mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND IS_BLIND = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT ,VIEWS ,TO_CHAR(BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "BOARD_CREATE_DATE" ,LIKE_COUNT ,COMMENT_COUNT ,MEM_NICK FROM TB_BOARD INNER JOIN MEMBER ON(TB_BOARD.MEM_NO = MEMBER.MEM_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' AND IS_BLIND = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT ,VIEWS ,BOARD_CREATE_DATE ,LIKE_COUNT ,COMMENT_COUNT ,MEM_NICK FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT ,TB.VIEWS VIEWS ,TO_CHAR(BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "BOARD_CREATE_DATE" ,TB.LIKE_COUNT LIKE_COUNT ,COMMENT_COUNT ,MEM_NICK FROM TB_BOARD TB INNER JOIN MEMBER ON (TB.MEM_NO = MEMBER.MEM_NO) WHERE TB.STATUS = 'Y' AND IS_BLIND = 'N' AND TB.LIKE_COUNT > 50 ORDER BY TB.LIKE_COUNT DESC, BOARD_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y' AND IS_BLIND = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT ,VIEWS ,TO_CHAR(BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS "BOARD_CREATE_DATE" ,LIKE_COUNT ,COMMENT_COUNT ,MEM_NICK FROM TB_BOARD INNER JOIN MEMBER ON(TB_BOARD.MEM_NO = MEMBER.MEM_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' AND IS_BLIND = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT FILE_NO fileNo ,ORIGINAL_NAME originalName ,UPDATE_NAME updateName ,FILE_PATH filePath ,REF_TYPE refType ,REF_NO refNo ,FILE_ANNOTATION fileAnnotation ,UPLOAD_DATE uploadDate FROM TB_FILES WHERE REF_NO = #{boardNo} AND REF_TYPE = 'board'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_FILES WHERE REF_NO = #{boardNo} AND REF_TYPE = 'board'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_COMMENT_NO ,BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS "BOARD_CREATE_DATE" ,BOARD_TOP_COMMENT ,BOARD_NO ,MEM_NICK FROM TB_BOARD_COMMENT INNER JOIN MEMBER ON(TB_BOARD_COMMENT.MEM_NO = MEMBER.MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND BOARD_COMMENT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_COMMENT_NO DESC
